div.p: RAPHAIM or Rephaim, (Moſes), a name figni-fyιng Giants, 23 they really were, and an actual people too, fituated in Baſan or Batanea. beyond Jordan, ſe-ρarated from the Zanzummim by the river Jabbok. Alſo a valley near Jeruſalem ; Joſhua x.
